meanings.definition: Not cautious or alert; lacking in awareness or caution.
meanings.sent1: The unwary rabbit hopped out of the bushes without looking around.
meanings.sent2: She regretted her unwary decision to trust a stranger with her personal information.
meanings.sent3: The unwary squirrel didn't notice the sneaky raccoon stealing its acorns.
meanings.sent4: The unwary traveler fell into the trap set by the cunning bandits.
meanings.sent5: Being unwary in the dark forest could lead to unexpected dangers.

meanings.definition: Not cautious or prudent; lacking in caution.
meanings.sent1: The unwary explorer ventured into the uncharted territory without a map.
meanings.sent2: His unwary behavior at the party resulted in some embarrassing moments.
meanings.sent3: The unwary chef accidentally added salt instead of sugar to the cake batter.
meanings.sent4: The unwary investor lost all his savings in a risky business scheme.
meanings.sent5: An unwary decision can sometimes lead to unforeseen consequences.
